long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Learning analytics is a bookmarking tool which you can save and share your favourite articles and also to find a learning partner by analysing your bookmarks.

We often forget or lose the website links or article links which we wanted. 
Learning analytics is used to store links of sites you bookmark.
It acts as bookmarking tool for your browser.
It is also used to predict/suggest your learning partner using machine learning.

You can visit the dashboard to get the links you bookmarked and also to access the community. 
You can also make your links private.
There is also an auto-bookmarking feature ( disabled by default ) which you can use to bookmark selected sites automatically.




Link for dashboard:
    https://featurepreneur.com/la/dashboard
